name: Bienvenue
description:
Hey there!

As a futur father I wondered how I could announce to family, friends and world, that my child was born. I decided to make a custom small video game as a birth announcement.

The project has been made with Unreal Engine 4, it is very possible that the performances are bad, I'm not an optimisation guy. Also the file is quite big...

Every assets were made by me, the music is partly generative (so don't hesitate to let it play ^^) and I made the whole game alone.

Only recent Macs can run the app (need Metal).

I hope you'll enjoy this tribute to my kid. Don't hesitate to comment!

I would have loved to keep working on it, but I have to go back to Hyperun !!!

Thanks!
